unnormalised: Arre yaar, hi biryani recipe-ant 250 gms tandull ghal mhanta, punn mhojem measuring scale-an suttie gheunk decide kelem! Mhojea "andaaz" vaprun quantity guess kortam, mhaka shubhechha di ani aasha kortam tem khichdi na zao mhunn.
normalised: Arre yaar, hi biryani recipe-an donso panchavis gram tandul ghal mhanta, punn mhojem mapchem kantem suttient gelein dista! Mhojea "andaazan" quantity guess kortam, mhaka shubhechha di ani axea asa ki tem khichdi zaun vochonam mhunn.
